title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models from any Python script.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now Open WebUI) with chat history, model management, and RAG plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama offering synchronous and asynchronous APIs for chat, embeddings, and model ops.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem that exposes idiomatic Ruby methods to chat, pull, and manage Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli (go)
summary: Alternative Go CLI for Ollama with colored output, progress bars, and shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production-ready pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed requests/responses and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server containerised with one-liner commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-chat-gradle-plugin
summary: Gradle plugin that adds chat tasks to JVM projects for interactive debugging and code generation.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/await bindings to the Ollama REST API with serde types.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package to chat with local Ollama models from mobile or desktop apps.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama for real-time chat bots inside Phoenix/LiveView applications.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package downloaded 200k+ times; provides typed JS interface to local Ollama server.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package with 100k+ monthly downloads; chat, embed, pull, and push models from Python.

title: r/ollama - Local LLM Ecosystem Discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tools, integrations, and troubleshooting Ollama deployments.
